data.title: rhythm and blues
data.meta_description: RHYTHM AND BLUES definition: 1. a type of popular music, originally by African American artists of the 1940s and 1950s, that…. Learn more.

Examples of rhythm and blues

rhythm and blues

A distinctive style of rhythm and blues was fostered in the city's clannish and somewhat ingrown atmosphere.

Releasing a total of 63 singles and two albums, the label's main focus was rhythm and blues/soul music.
